SqlOperation.Name: GetAll
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT w.*, wm.UserId, wm.Role FROM `wspc_workspaces` w INNER JOIN `wspc_workspace_members` wm ON w.Id = wm.WorkspaceId WHERE wm.UserId = @UserId ORDER BY `Name` ASC;

SqlOperation.Name: GetById
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT w.*, wm.UserId, wm.Role FROM `wspc_workspaces` w INNER JOIN `wspc_workspace_members` wm ON w.Id = wm.WorkspaceId WHERE wm.UserId = @UserId AND w.`Id` = @Id;

SqlOperation.Name: GetByName
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT w.*, wm.UserId, wm.Role FROM `wspc_workspaces` w INNER JOIN `wspc_workspace_members` wm ON w.Id = wm.WorkspaceId WHERE wm.UserId = @UserId AND w.`Name` = @Name;
